00059             function                __construct()
00060             {
00061                   try
00062                   {
00063                         $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00064                         $this->Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00065                         $this->PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00066                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00067                         $this->Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00068                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00069                   }
00070                   catch( Exception $e )
00071                   {
00072                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00073                   }
00074             }

00094             function                get_feed_records()
00095             {
00096                   try
00097                   {
00098                         if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'feed' , 'set' ) === false )
00099                         {
00100                               throw( new Exception( 'No feed was defined' ) );
00101                         }
00102                         
00103                         $Feed = $this->Security->get_gp( 'feed' , 'command' );
00104                         
00105                         $FeedScript = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_data( __FILE__ , "$Feed.sql" );
00106                         $FeedScript = $this->PageComposer->execute_processors( $FeedScript , 'post_process' );
00107                         
00108                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00109                         
00110                         $Result = $this->Database->query( $FeedScript );
00111                         
00112                         return( $this->Database->fetch_results( $Result ) );
00113                   }
00114                   catch( Exception $e )
00115                   {
00116                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00117                   }
00118             }
00119             
00142             function                compile_feed( $Records )
00143             {
00144                   try
00145                   {
00146                         $FeedXml = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'rss20_feed.tpl' );
00147 
00148                         foreach( $Records as $Record )
00149                         {                             
00150                               $FeedItem = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'rss20_item.tpl' );
00151 
00152                               $FeedItem = $this->String->print_record( $FeedItem , $Record );
00153 
00154                               $FeedXml = str_replace( '{items}' , $FeedItem.'{items}' , $FeedXml );
00155                         }
00156 
00157                         $FeedXml = str_replace( '{last_build_date}' , date( 'r' ) , $FeedXml );
00158                         $FeedXml = str_replace( '{package_path}' , _get_package_path( 'rss' , '2.0.0' ) , $FeedXml );
00159                         
00160                         $this->Settings->load_file( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_default' );
00161                         $FeedXml = $this->String->print_record( $FeedXml , $this->Settings->get_raw_settings() );
00162                         
00163                         $FeedXml = $this->PageComposer->execute_processors( $FeedXml , 'post_process' );
00164 
00165                         return( $FeedXml );
00166                   }
00167                   catch( Exception $e )
00168                   {
00169                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00170                   }
00171             }
00172             
00191             function                view( $Options )
00192             {
00193                   try
00194                   {
00195                         $Records = $this->get_feed_records();
00196 
00197                         $Feed = $this->compile_feed( $Records );
00198                         
00199                         $Feed = $this->Security->get( $Feed , 'unsafe_string' );
00200                         
00201                         header( "Content-Type: application/rss+xml" );
00202                         
00203                         return( $Feed );
00204                   }
00205                   catch( Exception $e )
00206                   {
00207                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00208                   }
00209             }
00210             
00237             function                process_rss_button( $Str , $Changed )
00238             {
00239                   try
00240                   {
00241                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'rss_button' ) ; )
00242                         {
00243                               $this->Settings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00244                               
00245                               $Type = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'type' , 'small' );
00246                               
00247                               $Code = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $Type.'_rss_button.tpl' );
00248                               
00249                               $Code = $this->String->print_record( $Code , $this->Settings );
00250                               
00251                               $Code = str_replace( '{package_path}' , _get_package_path( 'rss' , '2.0.0' ) , $Code );
00252                               
00253                               $Str = str_replace( "{rss_button:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
00254                               
00255                               $Changed = true;
00256                         }
00257                         
00258                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00259                   }
00260                   catch( Exception $e )
00261                   {
00262                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00263                   }
00264             }
00265             
00292             function                process_rss_link( $Str , $Changed )
00293             {
00294                   try
00295                   {
00296                         if( strpos( $Str , '{rss_link}' ) !== false )
00297                         {
00298                               $Str = str_replace( 
00299                                     '{rss_link}' , 
00300                                     '<link rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml" '.
00301                                           'title="{title}" href="{http_root}/rss.html" />' , 
00302                                     $Str
00303                               );
00304                         }
00305                         
00306                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00307                   }
00308                   catch( Exception $e )
00309                   {
00310                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00311                   }
00312             }
00313             
00344             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00345             {
00346                   try
00347                   {
00348                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_rss_button( $Str , $Changed );
00349                         
00350                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_rss_link( $Str , $Changed );
00351                         
00352                         return( $Str );
00353                   }
00354                   catch( Exception $e )
00355                   {
00356                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00357                   }
00358             }
